description: A theatrical display of coding emotions and activities. Random mood faces and dynamic activity detection based on file types present in your project. Displays: Random mood faces (ğŸ˜´ sleepy, ğŸ˜… laughing, ğŸ¤” thinking, ğŸ˜ cool, ğŸ¤¯ exploding, ğŸ¥³ partying, ğŸ˜¤ huffing, ğŸ¤– robotic), Programming activity (ğŸ Python, ğŸŒ JavaScript, ğŸ¦€ Rust, ğŸ’» generic), Random energy percentage (1-100%), Current time (HH:MM format).

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); MOOD_FACES=("ğŸ˜´" "ğŸ˜…" "ğŸ¤”" "ğŸ˜" "ğŸ¤¯" "ğŸ¥³" "ğŸ˜¤" "ğŸ¤–"); MOOD=${MOOD_FACES[$((RANDOM % ${#MOOD_FACES[@]}))]}; ACTIVITY=$([ -f "*.py" ] && echo "ğŸ Pythoning" || [ -f "*.js" ] && echo "ğŸŒ JSing" || [ -f "*.rs" ] && echo "ğŸ¦€ Rusting" || echo "ğŸ’» Coding"); TIME=$(date "+%H:%M"); ENERGY=$((RANDOM % 100 + 1)); echo "[$MODEL] $MOOD $ACTIVITY | âš¡$ENERGY% | ğŸ• $TIME | ğŸ“ ${DIR##*/}"'
